Module photos
Package com.photos.utility

Class Utility

java.lang.Object
com.photos.utility.Utility
public class Utility extends Object
A collection of non-class specific pure methods to promote code reuse

    • isUniqueAlbumName

      public static boolean isUniqueAlbumName(String oldName, String newName)
      Checks if the given album name is unique except in the case it happens to be the old name as well. This is useful for renaming operations.
      Parameters:
      oldName - The previous name
      newName - The new name
      Returns:
      Whether the new album name is unique
